thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-FormFactor Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.24

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FormFactor Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.24
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - FormFactor Inc:
* FORMFACTOR, INC. REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.24 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q4 REVENUE $131.9 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.27, REVENUE VIEW $130.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q1 GAAP REVENUE $112 MILLION TO $120 MILLION * SEES Q1 NON-GAAP REVENUE $112 MILLION TO $120 MILLION * SEES Q1 NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE FROM LOSS OF $0.05 TO PROFIT OF $0.01
* SEES Q1 NON-GAAP NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE $0.12 TO $0.18
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20, REVENUE VIEW $120.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
